document.heading: Defined Contribution Transition Vesting Clarification Amendment Act of 1998

history.narrative: Law 12-92, the “Defined Contribution Transition Vesting Clarification Amendment Act of 1998,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 12-407, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 4, 1997, and January 6, 1998, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 26, 1998, it was assigned Act No. 12-265 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 12-92 became effective on April 29, 1998.
